page.title: 08RELIGION IN DIDSBURY
page.content: Many religions are represented in our area.Members of the{Christian faith predominate but many immigrants coming here have brought their religions with them. We have found members of the following religions-{Buddhism,Judaism, {Islam,Sikhism}and{Hinduism.}The Sikhs,Hindus and Buddhists have shrines within their own homes and visit their places of worship less frequently than the Moslems and Jews.Most adhere closely to their feasts and fasts although this may cause absences at school or work. Of the people who call themselves Christians few attend church regularly and many are ignorant of what this faith proclaims-that there is only one way to{God}and that is by belief in the{Lord Jesus Christ}as a personal Saviour,and following Him.
